name: BabyWare
description:
Meet Babyware™©*, the newest innovation in parenting and childcare technology! Put your parenthood to the test in several life-like situations which every mommy or daddy-to-be will soon know too well.

Click and Drag to solve the many trials ahead of you! Just make sure not to let the batteries run out in each challenge.

Aim for the highest scores! There's nothing to be afraid of, you're not some kind of awful parent, are you?

Follow us on twitter!

Matheus Cunegato (Game Designer and Programmer)
